descript.abstract: Parcel boundaries are a geographic representation compiled from legal descriptions of property surveys and deeds of ownership as recorded in the Tompkins County Clerk's Office annually.
descript.purpose: Tax parcel boundaries in Tompkins County for a given year plus selected information added from the Tompkins County real property services (RPS) database for web applications. The boundaries represent the one-to-one match (GIS and RPS) with the parcel boundaries shown on the final paper maps for a given year. This version is mainly used for applications where there is a live link to the extensive RPS data via Imagemate Online.

idinfo.datacred: Tompkins County Assessment Department, Tompkins County ITS GIS Program (join and metadata), Tompkins County Clerk (deeds and source data)
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.0.3348

dataqual.complete: Compelte parcels for the entire county.

procstep.procdesc: Digital Tax Parcels vectorized from original mylars and migrated to MAPgrafix a Mac based GIS.
1998 migration of digital taxmap data from MAPgrafix format to ESRI Workstation Arc/Info Coverages.
Sepetember 2004 migration of digital data and scripts from Workstation Arc/INFO to ESRI ArcGIS Personal Geodatabase format.
February 2007-July 2012 migration and maintenance of taxmapping data and scripts in ArcGIS Desktop ArcSDE Geodatabase.
Export parcel layer from ArcSDE to ESRI file geodatabases and update scripts.
Export parcel layer to file GDB after 1-1 match, RPS join, additional data work.
Export parcel layer to end of year shapefile.
Export parcel layer to public version of shapefile.

mapproj.mapprojn: NAD 1983 StatePlane New York Central FIPS 3102 Feet

enttyp.enttypd: The New York State mandated database of property ownership and information in Tompkins County. This database is related to a subset of the RPS database extract using the SWISPRINTK field.
enttyp.enttypds: Tompkins County ITS GIS Program and Tompkins County Assessment Department

attr.attrdef: Real Property Services (RPS) database parcel key (Swis-Section-Block-Lot or SSBL). This field is updated yearly based on the GIS extract of the final-roll from Assessment's RPS database (no longer available as single field in RPS4.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: Concatenation of SWIS code, "-", and the PRINTKEY field, for those polygons without an account number (ie, a blank "ACCT_NUM"), or a concatenation of SWIS code, "-", and the "ACCT_NUM" field, for those polygons with an account number. This field is easily reproducible within the Real Property Services database extract, and is used as the primary join (key) field to the RPS extract from the parcel data sets.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: State SWIS code for the municipality in which the property is located.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment, Tompkins County ITS GIS, and New York State Real Property Services

attr.attrdef: Real Property Services database print key (Section-Block-Lot or S-B-L)
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: Local municipality in which parcel is located see SWIS field above.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: GIS calculated acreage via the ESRI calculate geometry function.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: Date the geographic boundary was last modified during the Taxmapping process
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: Tax map number assigned to the geographic parcel boundary during the Tax Mapping process.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: Year the parcel boundary was created during the tax mapping process.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: Last 20 numbers of the ParcelKey field w/out the SWIS values at the beginning to calculating URI link to Imagemate application.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment and Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: Assessed value of the land only
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014

attr.attrdef: Total Assessed value of the property including land and structure(s)
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014

attr.attrdef: School district in which the property is located.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment

attr.attrdef: School district values in non-coded format. See SCHOOL for the codes.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment, Tompkins County ITS GIS

attr.attrdef: Street number where the property is located. Please note that Situs address may defer depending on number of structures present.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014

attr.attrdef: Name of the street where the property is located. Please note that Situs address may defer depending on number of structures present.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014

attr.attrdef: Combined address number and street location for the property. Please note that Situs address may defer depending on number of structures present.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014

attr.attrdef: Zip code area in which the property is located. Please note that this will differ from the mailing zip code for joined properties (same swisprintk) that cuts across zip code areas the one with the situs address is used.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014, Tompkins County GIS.

attr.attrdef: Denotes whether property is in an agricultural district (1-Yes, 0, No).
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014

attr.attrdef: Municipal Neighborhood codes assigned to the property where available.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014, Tompkins County Assessment

attr.attrdef: Municipal zoning codes assigned to the property where available.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS extract 2014, Tompkins County Assessment

attr.attrdef: Deed book number in which property was recorded
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment

attr.attrdef: Deed page number in which property was recorded
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment

attr.attrdef: Measurement from the front of the property in feet.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment

attr.attrdef: Measurement from the front to rear of the property in feet.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County Assessment

attr.attrdef: Total measurement of the property expressed in either frontage and rear dimension (102' x 86') or acreage (Ac). This value is usually the frontage * rear dimension/43560 so for 102 x 86/43560 =.20 Ac
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS Extract 2014

attr.attrdef: A three digit code, established by ORPS for categorizing property by use. See: https://www.tax.ny.gov/research/property/assess/manuals/prclas.htm for enumerations
attr.attrdefs: New York State Department of Taxation and Finance Property class codes

attr.attrdef: General category which defines the three digit code, established by ORPS for categorizing property by use (this is the first number for each section 100-900)
attr.attrdefs: New York State Department of Taxation and Finance Property class codes - https://www.tax.ny.gov/research/property/assess/manuals/prclas.htm

attr.attrdef: Property class description which identifies the current use of the property For example, "Single Family Residential"
attr.attrdefs: New York State Department of Taxation and Finance Property class codes. https://www.tax.ny.gov/research/property/assess/manuals/prclas.htm

attr.attrdef: Information from the tax map process that represents an easting reading from the point of origin of the appropriate zone of the New York coordinate system to the visual center of each land parcel. See: https://www.tax.ny.gov/research/property/assess/rps/support/glossary.htm#g
attr.attrdefs: New York State Department of Taxation and Finance RPS V4 Glossary of Terms

attr.attrdef: Information from the tax map process that represents a northing reading from the point of origin of the appropriate zone of the New York coordinate system to the visual center of each land parcel. See: https://www.tax.ny.gov/research/property/assess/rps/support/glossary.htm#g
attr.attrdefs: New York State Department of Taxation and Finance RPS V4 Glossary of Terms

attr.attrdef: Denotes the type of water source (public or private) available on a property particularly if there is a structure on the property.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS Extract 2014

attr.attrdef: Denotes the type of sewage system (public or private) available on a property particularly if there is a structure on the property.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County RPS Extract 2014

attr.attrdef: Calculated field which denotes the URI for online linkages to the corresponding property record in Tompkins County Imagemate Online Application.
attr.attrdefs: Tompkins County ITS GIS 2014

attr.attrdef: Perimeter length in ft US
attr.attrdefs: ESRI

attr.attrdef: Area in sq ft US
attr.attrdefs: ESRI
